website_summaries.verdict: Packs a powerful punch, but smaller users may have difficulty maintaining a good grip. Possible shock hazard with side metal plates, but the sound of the discharging electrodes can be a deterrent.
pros: Delivers shock through top and side contacts
cons: Dimensions may be too large for smaller users
Some quality-control issues, especially with flashlight
Side metal plates could also shock user

customer_reviews.title: Literal life saver
customer_reviews.text: This paid for itself. I decided to walk to a nearby bar at 1:30am. This creepy guy started following me. I took a couple odd turns and he followed me each time. I turned around and buzzed the tazer he took right off.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great for self defence, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this stun gun, I tried to find videos on youtube about reviews and people using it but found very little about real tests, that's why I made this video, hope you all enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Romano Pérez

customer_reviews.title: Bought to keep jealous boar goat from butting me when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep jealous boar goat from butting me when I leave the yard. All I have to do is buzz it and the goats leave me alone. I also carry it when in town or cities and feel safer. I also am licensed and carry a 38. I have law enforcement background... reminder if you carry a defense weapon...Set your mind to be prepared to use the defense instrument in that small window of time & dont wait around to see if the perp will change their mind or you will loose that opportunity snd the weapon/defense instrument will be used on you.
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can have a way to protect myself ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can have a way to protect myself without the worry of actually killing someone. Very cool product. Makes me feel safer.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: FAILED ALREADY :-(
customer_reviews.text: I never have had to use my VIPERTEK 989 but I do charge it for an hour or more every month after doing a quick test to see that it’s working. On the tenth month it was dead. I was relieved to see that it has a lifetime Warranty but they make you return the unit at your expense. The cost of the shipping was about as much as a new unit. So pretty much a useless warranty and a sales gimmick IMO. I’m sure most will just buy a new unit as a result. Something to consider when buying.
customer_reviews.author: 2SierraMike

customer_reviews.title: OUCH!
customer_reviews.text: This thing will put a 250 pound man down in about two seconds flat. Trust me because I tried it on myself. If the sound alone doesn't deter a criminal thepunch it packs certainly will. For the money well well well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I read the instructions, followed them, despite the fact I have a lot of experience with different all kinds of self defense tools. Tested the light, cool, now time to test the taser, holding it arms length away and my hand no where near the metal, I was shocked through the activation button. That was a complete surprise and hurt like hell. Turned it on and off and tried once more to find the light had blown, the taser still worked but sent the current up my arm again. Absolutely terrible experience with no customer service or help of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and well put together
customer_reviews.text: Just recently received it. Seems sturdy and well put together. Had my wife test it on my side (she enjoyed it), and it hurt like hell! My muscle convulsed a bit with just a very short shock, and that was besides the pain. Holding it longer would have brought me down. I'm 6'1" and weigh 230. I recommend it, and wouldn't want to come up against it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful well Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had stun guns in the past but none like this one IT WILL put you on your butt I tried it out on myself wearing a leather motorcycle riding jacket never again ! The sound it makes is enough to scare someone off. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product because of the good reviews. Unfortunately I had to return the product ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the good reviews. Unfortunately I had to return the product because the battery would not hold a charge. Hopefully, once I receive credit, I will purchase a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Vonderheide

customer_reviews.title: Good quality zapper.
customer_reviews.text: This feels very comfy in your hand. The prongs stick out quite a bit and there safe anti grab parts on the sides of a perp tried to grab it. The flashlight is decent, and the zapper is very loud and bright. This would take down a crack head.
customer_reviews.author: CMast

customer_reviews.title: Great for RUNNERS
customer_reviews.text: I am a nighttime runner so I was looking for a product that would be easy to carry, not too bulky or heavy, but that would add some security and feelings of safety to my self and my family while out in the dark hours by myself. I am hoping I will never need to use this, but I feel so much more peace of mind just having it! So, I can't say it works effectively, but just pulling the trigger with no subject to taze, it sure looks like it would do the trick! Holster fits perfectly on my run belt, snug & secure, no bouncing!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Banks

customer_reviews.title: Owned 3 Viperteks. None work
customer_reviews.text: This was my third Vipertek purchase. My other two had simply stopped charging. I figured that they did not last more than a year or two. But I am now thinking that it has something to do with the manufacturer. After only owning this Vipertek stun gun for less than a month, it will not charge. Oh, and the lifetime warranty? HAHAHAHA! There is no warranty you fools. Try getting in touch with Vipertek. Go on. Try it. You can't. At least, I can't. There is no phone number and they do not answer emails from their own website.
customer_reviews.author: Drool

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product over a year ago and I like so much I purchased another one a few days ago. I keep one in my truck (and sometimes in my pocket) and the other in my fanny pack that I ware when I go walking every morning. When an unfriendly dog hears the crackling from the stun-gun, it immediately stops. I've never had to actually use it in self defense, but it is comforting to know that if I need help I have it (I am 70). It is a really good product. It works like it was engineered to work and the price is good. I recommend it for self defense and to ward off unwanted dogs.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Mine was junk
customer_reviews.text: First test after opening the box, one of the electrodes popped out.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Batterry drains from Full to 0 within 2-3 days
customer_reviews.text: As of September 2019, this item's fully charged battery holds its charge only for 2 days; by the 3rd day the battery is completely depleted, rendering this item useless.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Zap for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Best taser for the price on Amazon. Accidentally zapped myself once! This product will definitely do the job if you're ever assaulted, God forbid that happens. Sturdy, easy to use with a lanyard for carrying and keeping the taser from being yanked away.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Best out of 36 different tazers owned
customer_reviews.text: By far the best taser I have bought this makes number 36 and if you want to stop your attacker this is by far the one after 5 seconds of shock it took 15 minutes for the person to be able to move so if your looking to stop someone no retreats this is the one
customer_reviews.author: Richardraywhitworth

customer_reviews.title: Unit blew up in my hand!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the unit in my hand and it was activated. Though the explosion was contained within the housing, something inside blew up and it smoked. Unit still works/sparks, sort of, but nowhere close to its original performance and dies quickly although battery is charged and flashlight is bright. I'm lucky it didn't shatter in my hand. I would think twice before buying this unit. This happened about 6 months after I got it. Didn't receive a lot of usage, so I would say the design margins are inadequate to call this a quality product. I'm very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Jan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't discharge at all after charging. I could see a small electrical current on either side of the prongs, but that's all it did besides smelling like something was burning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for walking the dog at night
customer_reviews.text: I carry this when walking my dog at night. The flashlight works well and it is an excellent product. I like it because if you press the button for a second it makes a loud and intimidating zapping sound with an electrical arc and I have scared several stray dogs away without actually hurting them. We were attacked twice before without it and my dog was injured!
customer_reviews.author: MikeinSC

customer_reviews.title: Does not “stun” while in flashlight mode
customer_reviews.text: It definitely sounds scary when you flip the “zapper” on! Might make someone think twice about approaching you in the first place if they heard it! You do have to switch out of flaslight mode to “stun” mode to use the tase/stun feature - and I am both glad and nervous about that. Will I have the time and presence of mind to switch in a desperate situation? Or am I happy there is less chance I accidentally hurt myself or others while in flashlight mode? I guess each person must decide for themselves if this is a positive or negative feature.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Nice gun. Cheap case. Lame charging system.
customer_reviews.text: Nice gun with a flash light that I will never use, but the gun delivers a nice jolt. The storage case is not all that great and should be better. The charging system should be made better. The instructions says charge 6 hours, but don't overcharge. All it has is battery charging light, but there's really no way to tell if it's fully charged. It's really a guessing game. Like a lot of electronics it should come with a charging system that shuts off when fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: No Charge Indicator!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be safe, you need to know if your stun gun is charged. UNFORTUNATELY, there is NO indication of the charge level. That renders this dangerously useless. When you have to hope it has the charge you need when the chips are down - you have a problem. The absence of a charge indicator - is a terrible flaw
customer_reviews.author: Nickster

customer_reviews.title: Threads for probes messed up
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, one of the probes fell off the end right away and won't stay in the threads. returning it
customer_reviews.author: Frednich

customer_reviews.title: I used it on my self, and its strong!
customer_reviews.text: Against my better judgement, I used to on my self to get a sense of what these can do. These almost knocked me out! I'm glad to have these as a part of my at home defense kit. It does have your standard two button operation so you don't accidentally zap your self. Comes in a nice holster that you can attach to your belt or simply store in. There is a plug in cord for charging included. No remove-able batter from what I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: A. Saleem

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE ANY VIPERTEK PRODUCTS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE ANY VIPERTEK PRODUCTS!!!Supposedly there is a lifetime warranty for their stun guns...but NO ONE responds to several attempts to fix this. (email only, as they do not have a phone number listed anywhere) My "LIFE TIME WARRANTY" stun gun broke a little after a year, and after several attempts to reach them with no luck, I read the reviews from VIPERTEK. Basically most customers experienced what i had: NO RESPONSE after several tries. They have no phone numbers listed to call them. false advertising with "lifetime warranty" .HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I got two for both my sisters, and upon testing it out, it makes a scary sound and a flashing light which is cool but when I tested it on two different people (females) it only zapped them a little bit and hurt for a second, I cant imagine this would do anything except piss off a real attacker. They are better off with pepper spray honestly. The thing that annoys me most is that there is a $10 dollar restocking fee which is complete BS, so im out $20 and I had to go through the hassle of returning these items. Wouldn't recommend unless your looking to scare someone, otherwise its not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Harijana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold a charge. Could’ve put me in a bad position
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions on how to charge. It worked at the time then I put it away because I didn’t need it. One day I decided to check on it, and the stun didn’t work, just the flashlight. I thought maybe I left it on on accident and it ran out of charge. Charged it again, same thing happened. So glad I didn’t actually need it for an emergency, or I would have definitely been in danger with a stun gun that I thought worked but actually didn’t. Don’t recommend this product. I contacted the seller about a refund or exchange, we’ll see if they actually get back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chook

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable power cord, unsafe. Causes me to question the stun gun itself.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get past the core problem I had, which is: the prong in the (ultra cheap) power cord does not fit securely in any outlet (sits VERY loose) and so in some "positions" sparks are emitted - have never seen this issue in any electric device. So, I consider this item to be unsafe. Didn't try the stun gun as a result and no confidence in this company or the stun gun itself, for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: FAILED TO WORK WHEN NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I NEEDED THIS YESTERDAY AGAINST A HOMELESS THUG AND IT ONLY POPPED ONCE AND NOTHING MORE! IT'S JUNK PURE AND SIMPLE! WORTHLESS! UNRELIABLE! USELESS! DID NOTHING TO DETER A WOULD BE ASSAILANT!!! SKIP THIS PIECE OF JUNK! IT WILL NOT PROTECT YOU EVER!!! IT'S WORTHLESS! TO THINK I PUT MY SAFETY IN THE HANDS OF TRASH LIKE THIS IS INSANE!!!! IF A MAN HADN'T RAN ACROSS THE STREET TO CHASE AWAY THE THUG, WHO KNOWS WHAT WOULD HAVE HAPPENED. GOOD THING I ALSO HAD A KNIFE WITH ME!!! WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Melton

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE TO USE. WILL NOT FUNCTION IN A PINCH> Dont count on it for personal protection.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Mother. I wanted to make sure it was effective before giving her a item that would not work in a emergency,. Worked as advertised about the first 6 months. i keep it charged as per the instructions sent with item. The Flashlight works fine but the reason i bought it was for the stun effect. STOPPED WORKING. Will not produce a spark in less than 6 months after purchase. I did not use it improperly and followed the instructions. Better to buy a dog whistle than this for protection.
customer_reviews.author: W E Fisher Jr

customer_reviews.title: When it worked it worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this VTS-989, a while back, mostly due to the lifetime warranty. Recently the gun has stopped arcing across the two terminals, thus not making the threatening sound that is a such a great deterrent for both the human and canine kind! I've been trying to get in touch with Vipertek about replacement or repair, and all I get are crickets, no return emails, no calls, no nothing. WHAT GOOD IS LIFETIME WARRANTY if you can't get in touch with the manufacturer. SO purchase with caution, because if it breaks your SOL despite the lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow_Tracker50

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought my stun gun in November of last year. Whenever I charge it I test it by turning it on for a second and seeing it spark once, as per the instructions. After a year it stopped working, the indicator lights show that it's turned on but it doesn't make a spark. If you're reading this and employed with the company please let me know how I can get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Good to Take While Walking
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an avid walker and he always takes this stun gun with him. We live in the country and often our neighbors dogs often come down their driveways to intimidate him. If one happens to get too close he presses the stun button. The mere sound will make them run back to their house. Leaving 4 stars because the first gun purchased quit working after a couple months. However I emailed the seller and the very same day as the email they responded back saying they were sending out a new one. 5 stars to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: terdallaujar

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything but this does not work at all. It's charged, the flashlight comes on but that's all. I don't know how to tell you what it does because it does nothing. Push the discharge button and it is completely silent. Whatever I got is 100% defective or I am doing something terribly wrong. But I'm not. This does not work at all. Ever. Frustrating because I have not read a single other review by a person who has one that doesn't work. So I thought I was doing something wrong. But I'm not. The product I received might as well just be a piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Sand

customer_reviews.title: Works as a deterrent
customer_reviews.text: This works as a deterrent. I’m a 34 year old single woman, and I walk my dog every morning and night. I keep this with me, and shoot off the taser if anyone is even approaching, and the sound scares keeps people away. I have not actually had to use it on a person, and I hope I am never in a situation where I have to.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, however trying to take it out of the casing (that you attach to your belt) is a little finicky. I would practice take it out so that if the time ever comes, you’ll have it ready for use. 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Hoop La

customer_reviews.title: Which to safe me and anyone with me.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a dangerous place. There are many homeless people, junkies, mentally challenged people, and dangerous people who want nothing more than to hurt you. I've had men who have challenged me in the parking lot aggressively, tried to get into my truck with me on the passenger side as I entered the driver's side, attacked myself and my customers, etc. I had a smaller electronic mailer, but it wasn't enough. I had to use it enough and it wasn't enough to protect me to help myself or the person i was enough it was it was with me. This one, however, was enough. I felt safe, protected and IT WAS ENOUGH!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good to have, just in case...
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never have to use it for anything other than a flashlight... but I sure feel good about having it in case I ever need it. I’ve never owned a stun gun previously, but I decided I feel better having something to defend myself if needed. I read reviews, read the one-page user instructions that came with it, and pushed “that” button to see the imposing ZAP. I don’t want to feel that zap. It just LOOKS painful. This seems like it will do the job. I hope I’m never put in a situation to find out for sure. Hopefully this is never needed to be anything except a flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Yanas_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: First one that arrived was broken in that the pillars were bent in towards each other and didn't produce an arc so it was useless for anything other than a flash light. The replacement order came in and the pillars were still a little bent however it still produced an arc and everything else. Other than that my only other gripe is the box in both cases came beaten up as though these tasers where previously used/owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was great but now boy sure. Waiting on custumer service response.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this oct 20 2018 its sept 14 2019. Ive never had to use it besides flashlight and small checks on the tazer. Twice a month help charge. Just charged it went to test and it emits brights blue from the top inside and no crackle just an odd smell. Not trying it again. I hope this is a mistake on this device it made me feel safe but bow knowing it can malfunction im worried. im hoping the company will take back my tazer see what's wrong and maybe make it up to me by sending me a better replacement model. Im hoping for the best. I'll keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Brad jensen

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have with me when I walk my dogs. Sometimes I have to walk them after dark. I loved that this has a flashlight as part of the unit but after using the flashlight maybe 20 times & having the unit for 6 months it won’t work at all! The light to show it is charging still lights up but the flashlight & stun part won’t do anything. I get that it’s inexpensive but I would have thought it should last at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable Device
customer_reviews.text: Protection. After fully charging this unit and test firing for 1 second it quit and never came on again. Would not recommend or ever purchase again. I really wish it would have worked properly. Thank goodness I did not have a life threatening incident when it failed.
customer_reviews.author: Redstar

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality! The prong fell of the taser when test firing!
customer_reviews.text: This taser looked like it was in good condition when I first opened the box, the first time I went to test it (no contact, just push the triggers) one of the prongs literally FELL OFF! It fell off guys! If that doesn’t tell you about quality I don’t know what will!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Burbank

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a solid unit
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the opportunity to try it out yet so unfortunately, I can't speak to its efficiency in doing what it should. I tried to find a volunteer but my wife absolutely refuses to be my guinea pig even for a new pair of shoes. So I'll give one to her and the other to my daughter and pray neither ever have to deploy them but if they do they will work as advertised. Maybe a company-sponsored video would alleviate any concern in this area. I'm sure for a couple of cheeseburgers you could find some Marine poolees who would enjoy the challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Oldcaywest

customer_reviews.title: Don't!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT zap yourself!! My left-hand does not know who my right hand is anymore after it accidentally got zapped! I was holding this bad boy with my right hand. Turned it on while left hand was holding the other end. I thought I was turning off the device but no, I hit the trigger. The left arm jolt so hard and fast, I am still looking for all of my fingernails!
customer_reviews.author: Dwain415

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use it yet (thankfully), but it works just fine. Charged up with no issues, and I set a timer to keep from overcharging it. I also followed the directions of not sparking it for more than one second at at a time, which could have been what others could have been doing wrong in their reviews. No one will let me test it out on them, but all the men said it's the real deal! Beware, some dogs hate this and will collapse if you spark it while they are in the room. I wish the case had a clip on it, but I can get one.
customer_reviews.author: Kymme

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, packs a painful punch!
customer_reviews.text: Take this along on all dog walks. Firing noise usually does the trick to discourage loose, aggressive dogs, haven’t had to actually make contact with another dog or person. Accidentally zapped my fingers while test firing before a walk and it hurt like hell. Nice to have first “hand” confirmation that it packs a painful punch!
customer_reviews.author: Suzan B.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and it will serve the purpose, the voltage claimed is questionable.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I, would think its impossible to have 990 million volts come out of this device, the spark would jump across the parking lot, could be common core math that came up with those numbers, its more like 50 thousand my estimation, but besides that, it does work quite well and will serve the propose, for the money its a good buy and impressive discharge will send them running.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to most anyone
customer_reviews.text: This "weapon" allows my husband to walk our dog with confidence knowing that most unleashed dogs that he encounters will not approach when they hear the electrical "ZAP" sound that this "gun" gives off in just one brief moment when activated. I bought one for myself, too, for the same reason, as well as carrying it when I go for a bike ride. I have been chased in the past by dogs off leash, but no more! They turn and run now without incident! So, this product turns out to be both practical and efficient. I would recommend it to most anyone, and pray that those who do purchase it will use it responsibly!
customer_reviews.author: Marietta Pellicano

customer_reviews.title: Won't retain a charge
customer_reviews.text: I keep the stun gun charging until I take it with me. In less than 24 hours it goes dead. This happened from the beginning. I'm not happy with this stun gun for that reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jody E. Canfield

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: 58 Billion....what? "Do not discharge for more than one second or it will damage the unit" "Do not overcharge or this will damage the unit" How do you know it's overcharging? You forgot to mention, do not drop on ground or else the cheap plastic will explode in a dozen pieces. Yet, you call this "Heavy Duty?"
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I was wearing a pair of scrubs, and I just had to try it out. Was sitting in a chair, just gave it one shot, and it basically jolted me out of the chair and I dropped the unit onto carpeted floor. I'm 6' and 210 lbs. It works, and that was just one shock, cant imagine if I held the button down. also in just the free air, if you hold the button down. its makes a terrifying noise that nobody on earth would attempt come at you seeing the electricity pass through the nodes and hear that crackling noise. Would have given 5 out of 5 but havent used it in real life yet
customer_reviews.author: Phillip L. Salamacha

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this April of 2018, i kept in my bedroom just in case. I charged it every now and then just like the comments said to do. Unfortunately, yesterday the time came that I had to use it. And IT DID NOT WORK. The flashlight works, the red button lights up, but it wont do anything when pressing the button. I am so dissapointed. I trusted this to keep me safe. I didnt know what to do.. i hope this does not happen to any of you. Keep a back up or something. This product was so promising too because of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Anahi

customer_reviews.title: WOW.  My first stun gun.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive and easy to use. I like this one because it's got a lot of juice behind it, it has the prongs that would make deeper contact through clothes, I like the grab deterrent feature and I like how easy it is to deploy. It's big enough that you can get a good full grip on it, use one hand to activate, arm and deploy. I didn't zap anyone with it but the sound it makes WOW! I hope I never have to use it but I'm glad to have it. Compared to the lower priced models in IMO this is totally worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: ~SusanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge but we will try one more.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stun gun on July 7th and today is August 6th and it was fine for a couple of weeks but now it won't hold a charge. This is the third one we bought in the last couple of years and this is the first one that went bad. My husband is in law enforcement and has to have a a non lethal weapon for back up and it has to be reliable. I will buy one more and see how it goes. I will post another review after we see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Even an instant shock will deter an aggressor
customer_reviews.text: First one I received stopped working after a couple test try's and ended up accidentally zapping myself (won't do that again if possible) , manufacture shipped out a replacement immediately even before I sent the bad one back, I really liked that kind of service. I would recommend this to anyone in the security field or just for personal protection. I myself use it for both, my one problem with the unit is that you are instructed not to fire the device more then a second or two without having the device touching a assailant. I like to use the sound and the spark as a deterrent to keep a perpetrator at a safe distance.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Burse

customer_reviews.title: Self defense
customer_reviews.text: After getting assaulted on my way to work by a random homeless person, I knew I wanted to be more prepared. I immediately went online to look for a taser and came across this one. I got two. One for my car and one for my backpack. You just never know. It could happen again, to anyone, at any place and at any time. The taser is a good size. I wanted to make sure it will give the assailant a good shock for trying to mess with me. Easy to use. Just gotta remember to charge it for an hour every month.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch...
customer_reviews.text: Ok i dont know about all those bad reviews but im so glad i went with my gut and tried this product. Damn it packs a punch. Light works great... Taser works even better. So good that im gonna purchase one for each of my adult daughters. Light weight and feels good in my hand. Doesnt feel cheap or to heavy to carry. I hope i never have to use it... But if i do, i have faith it will work as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Close-in Defense
customer_reviews.text: Liked the single button that went either light-or-stun; hard to mistake or misuse. Safe to keep in a purse or backpack. In fact, it would make people think you're using a flashlight, on a lanyard. Unless you want to turn it on an aggressor. It is capable of penetrating fabric- I pressed it to my leg, and know it delivers a nasty surprise. The recharge cable is a separate 1 ft., so it can be left behind. It held a good charge for a whole month before my (ouch) test. But remember, it only works if you are up close and personal.
customer_reviews.author: Amaxon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dogs twice a day and I live in a downtown area where there are a lot of homeless people, sketchy people, and stray dogs. Luckily, I’ve never had to use it, but I feel safer knowing I have it. It’s easy to use and rechargeable. My husband had to use it to scare off a homeless panhandling lady who was clearly on drugs yelling at us and approaching us for no reason other than we wouldn’t give her money and it worked. We didn’t touch her with it, and just zapped the air but the sound alone scared her and she ran off. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuuner
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stun gun. The noise it makes is deterrent enough, but taking a sting from it even worse. I take it hiking with me and definitely gives a sense of security. I ordered a second for my sister-in-law who works late at night. The only reason for 4 stars is that one day it just stopped working. Charged as normal, and then nothing. So a couple of hikes went by that I didn’t realize it wasn’t charged. Then I pressed the switch and nothing. Probably a year or so after purchase. Maybe that’s an expected lifespan for a rechargeable product. Otherwise, great item!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Y. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Looks ok
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Seems to be working well, have not tried it to someone else. I bought this for protection against dog attack. Cons: It does not tell me if the charge is full. Light is always yellow. The holster that comes with it looks cheap. It is very hard to pull out of the holster. I cannot rely on it in case of emergency because it is hard to come out of the holster.
customer_reviews.author: Loev

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used it, only tested it for a few short bursts ever. Now it is dead, will not charge, not even the flashlight will illuminate. I bought it brand new and have not heard anything back from Vipertek's customer service. Even the seller here never answered my basic question about how to get a new holster which broke very quickly. Customer service is becoming more important and these guys have none. Save your $$, Buy a stun gun that is much higher quality, not Vipertek.
customer_reviews.author: Drumatar75

customer_reviews.title: Useless, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: My return window closed so I don’t even know how to return this thing. Purchased last year. Always kept it on me. Up until the day it ran out of charge. Had it for probably a week or 2 if that before it died. Flashlight still worked so kept it in my car and just carried my mace. Well fast forward to last night. Doesn’t charge, flash light doesn’t work. Unfortunately I’ve been in situations where I would need it but thank god I never pulled it out because the attackers would have had a good laugh before continuing. This is horrible. I’d sue if I could
customer_reviews.author: Tamia

customer_reviews.title: Ouch...That hurts!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to test how effective this device is and after been zapped -at request- three different times at various areas and length of time. I can firmly say this will take anyone down even paralyze if you keep it longer on their body. I was so impressed that I bought one more. You cannot understand how much $20 bucks can hurt someone or yourself for that matter. If you do not believe give it a try, you will be SHOCKED literally.
customer_reviews.author: S-mario

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This stun gun is terrible. I bought one that arrived damaged. They sent me another one that is also damaged. The stun gun doesn’t work at all. Never did work. If you just want a flash light you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Roman The Great

customer_reviews.title: Strong product be careful!
customer_reviews.text: This product has some serious kick, not like the other cheap tasers I’ve seen. Accidentally got myself just a little trying to learn the buttons for quick use and I lost control of my whole body for that split second. Only thing I don’t like is the flashlight comes on no matter what going to taser setting. But I feel much better knowing my fiancé walks to and from her car at work with this bad boy and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Paul lore

customer_reviews.title: Would not feel safe without it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these and m very happy with the ease and usefulness! One in the door pocket of my car the other I use daily when I walk! I have warded more than one friendly dog because I do not trust them when they are lose! The sound always takes care of them with out having to actually tase them! Also a couple of to friendly men so far have decided to move on!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Immoos

customer_reviews.title: Terrifying.. which is a good thing!
customer_reviews.text: Luckily, I have not had to use this in a self defense situation yet, but it sure packs a punch! Upon test firing it, I realized just how much of a diversion this would be to someone who had their sights set on you with malicious intent. I was concerned about accidentally zapping myself, but the safety feature and included case have prevented that (trust me, I am a klutz and they are very effective). I feel a lot safer carrying this around with me, and am confident that if I needed to use it, I would surely ward off whoever was warranting the occasion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No response on defective holster.
customer_reviews.text: Luckily, I haven't had to use the product. I have tested it outside and believe it packs a jolt. Just the sound may be enough to scare off a threat. My one complaint is that after only using the belt loop holster a handful of times, the loop has pulled off. There was never much stress. I believe it was not stitched well, as there is no tearing what so ever. I have emailed the company and have received no response.
customer_reviews.author: RS in SD

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these for protection from aggressive dogs. We used TWO of them at once on a 140 pound mastiff that was attacking one of our dogs. These tasers did NOTHING to this mastiff and my dog has a big hole in his neck. I ended up falling with one of them in my hand and the cheap thing is now broken. The red on/off switch came off. Completely useless. They were both fully charged during the week previous to the attack. If my return window had not closed, I would be returning these. I am so disappointed and frustrated!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A WASTE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: worked great for 5 months and one day "just dead".....light still on when charging but doesn't work anymore. No zap, zip or anything....just dead in the water!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Valdes

customer_reviews.title: very loud and scary
customer_reviews.text: I got this to let my wife be less afraid while walking a small blind dog around our neighborhood. Once in a while there will be a dog or two roaming loose and generally friendly, but you never know. We charged it up and turned it on and it made a loud sudden noise. I assume that it would scare away most dogs. it sure made my wife jump. I hope she wouldn't drop it at that point. LOL I think that it will be a confidence thing more than a weapon, because we are too old to use it vigorously.
customer_reviews.author: Larry K. Milton

customer_reviews.title: Careful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine just stopped working after a few months. I've never used it on anyone. I went to change it as I normally do monthly and it doesn't work anyone.
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Hell yeah!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keep this well hidden from children. The switch is very easy to move up and down, making it easy for a child to risk electrocuting his/herself. My brother accidentally stunned himself and it was only for a split second, but he still felt the nerves from his finger to his wrist paralyze for a second. I imagine an intentional stun really packs a punch! The sound it makes on its own is loud and scary enough to get people away from you! Overall super great! Again just make sure it's well hidden from children.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Self Defense Tool
customer_reviews.text: The product I purchased was for my daughter, who recently moved into an apartment with her good friend. While I disagree that any device can produce as much pure voltage as Vipertek claims, I studied the company's website and ordered the stun gun for her. It was difficult to discern the actual stooping power of the device (charge versus voltage) but it appears to be of high quality and strength. I will continue to research how quality stun guns are designed, knowing there is no real standard for their design in the marketplace. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Markatekt

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase to cure constipation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom on Christmas. Got drunk and gave it a go, now I have never been struck by lightning but if it causes your whole body to tense up and bowels to lose all control then it's like lightning. I feel my mom's now safe but my dad seems scared.
customer_reviews.author: Raeannah Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Puts on a good hurt.
customer_reviews.text: Well yeah, I'm going to try it on myself. A half second pulse on my thigh felt like being shot by a paperclip shot with a elastic band. Hurt pretty good but pain went away pretty quickly. Based on that, I think this would be effective with a long burst on the right area of the body for a temporary defense technique.
customer_reviews.author: Edsel Buglar

customer_reviews.title: Works for a few weeks eventually will stop working
customer_reviews.text: Worked when I revicied it charges it and carried with me and work. Decided to test it out a week later didnt work. So I charged it for 2 hours and it still didnt work. It turns on and the flashlight works but the tazer doesnt work anymore. Save time and money get a different tazer this one not the one.
customer_reviews.author: aem

customer_reviews.title: Glass Cannon
customer_reviews.text: A damn fine taser that will drop most creatures like a rock. But after a few months of simply carrying it on my belt; the flashlight just stopped working and the electrical nodes on the end became bent out of shape. Once I actually did tase a perpetrator, he crumbled. But I dropped it from waist height afterwards and it no longer works at all. So, if you just plan to keep it in a place where it will never move or bump into anything then you are clear to buy. If you’re actually taking it out to do work then god help you if you gently bump into something lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cai-ren

customer_reviews.title: Have not tried it yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, After a few months they seem to be a good product, but have never tried it to see if it even works yet. The light is bright and the red warning light is enough to spook someone without zapping them. I walk my dogs after dark and it would take a dummy to come at you with that red light shining so bright in your hand. Wait I'll take one out side and see how it sparks. brb.. Oh yea, that is pretty bad-a.s.s, would make me turn around and run if someone was after me with one of these. Get one for your wife and daughter.
customer_reviews.author: NWA

customer_reviews.title: Silly uses for a Taser 😱
customer_reviews.text: So far we haven't needed to use it for anything other than tasering food products as an experiment to see what happens with the food. I know that sounds dumb, but it is interesting to see what happens when 30,000 volts is applied to a hotdog, an egg, or a apple w/ a 100 watt light in it. Spoiler Alert... It didn't do anything to the hotdog or the egg surprisingly, but it did light up the bulb in the apple as long as the taser was applied to the apple.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hehl

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a high-voltage stun gun
customer_reviews.text: After opening, I discharged once to ensure operability and it looks and sounds ominous. LED flashlight works fine and unit fits my hand comfortably. Safety feature allows stun only if on/off and trigger are pushed simultaneously with thumb and middle finger, easy 1-second reaction process. Reviews sound great but hope I never have to use mine. Decent price for a high-voltage stun gun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really liking this!
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about the taser. Although I don’t understand the side button that shows the power on/off when it stays on the “on” position. My only issue is the wristlet handle completely fell apart yesterday and I don’t understand why. I’ve had the taser a week now and it always in my backpack never taken out. So the first time I took it out I had it attached to my wrist and this morning I saw the strings fall apart in my hands. Is that common? I’m sure I could try to find strong string but that’s the only reason I couldn’t give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: This will take you out!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Have a lot of coyotes in my area and when out for a walk they tend to walk around you. It's never the coyote you see, it's the others lurking in the woods you should be aware of. They are pack animal's. Anyway a quick blast of this thing will scare them away. I carry something better for bad people, wild animals are just hungry. Works great, get one!
customer_reviews.author: Alsby

customer_reviews.title: Stun Gun...I think I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for walks with my dog, as coyotes are everywhere now. Love the size and ease of use but it doesn't keep the charge (yes, I fully charged it as instructed, and recharged 2-3 hours when it stopped working). It worked great when I first received it but the last couple of time when I was confronted with coyotes it just let out one spark and small sound, when it should have been fully charged. Definitely would not purchase again! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: LynnO

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work! I know from experience!
customer_reviews.text: I had to use this on a dog in a dog fight and it didn't do anything! When making contact the electricity just stopped. If it worked properly I could have saved 1000 at the emergency room!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Finelli

customer_reviews.title: Make me feel safer
customer_reviews.text: Whew, I can't imagine anything still coming after you if you just show them this thing and flip it on for a second. I have zero plans to try it but it seems like if it ever came in contact with something it would bring it down. Note, the directions say not to discharge it for over 1 second unless you are actually using it against something attacking you. I wanted to note this because I find myself playing with it so it doesn't startle me as much as an unsuspecting attacker.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Coyotes
customer_reviews.text: This is an update. Saw two coyotes that were a block away. Lost track of them but my husband was watching. He said they were hunkered down in some tall grass which we would be walking our dog close to. I couldn’t see them but whipped out the stun gun and pressed the button. The coyotes jumped up and ran away so fast it was actually funny and yes, they were really close. I have always wanted to try out this stun gun and am very happy to note that it really works, on coyotes that is.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great but I'm Unlucky
customer_reviews.text: Ive had it for 2 days. Love the size, its comfortable to hold and carry. It was easy to charge. Only problem at the moment is that the button to turn it off/on and to turn the flash light on is malfunctioning. I messaged the seller, so we will see how their customer service is. Im sorry I just got a bad one bc the reviews are great.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: May not work only 2 of the 3 ordered works
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these but only 2 of the 3 work. One of them only the light works and no shocking. I would leave all 5 stars but this means you may not get one that works. What if it fails when you need to use it ? It’s concerning.
customer_reviews.author: mark cain

customer_reviews.title: Tazer Power!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest piece of protection I've ever purchased that isn't a gun. Once on, you must be careful not to hit the red button or you could harm yourself. Do not try any tricks or you could harm yourself. Trust me, this is not a toy. It's the truth!! A bit sensitive. Sound wise, a person will know you have something they do not want a part of, plus I really like the flashlight. It's extremely bright! It's very easy to use. As it ages, you have to keep it charged. It does pack a mean PUNCH! I've shocked myself by accident my thumb was sore for over a week. Please keep it out of reach of ALL children. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works, I tried it!
customer_reviews.text: At first touch it feels lightweight and cheap, kinda like the price would suggest. It does indeed have a powerful shock. My friend tried it like 5 times but he's ok with pain. He only tried for a split second every time. So I tried it once, it was very painful like the worst pinch you've ever had, but you have to hold it on for it to do more than just give someone an adrenaline rush.
customer_reviews.author: Rog

customer_reviews.title: My own bear repellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I almost bumped into a bear that night. Usually they don't bother people, but there are a few in the area that are little to used to humans. I've flipped the switch from flashlight to snapping, and he never hangs around. It's loud, and sounds like it would do some damage.
customer_reviews.author: Riah X

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price, loud and bright, big electric arc.
customer_reviews.text: It is very loud and very bright. The sides of the end with the electrical contacts has metal strips that are hooked up so if someone tries to grab it away from you they could be shocked if you hit the button. The instructions say not to activate it for more than a second or two without zapping something as that may cause damage to the unit. Kind of a let down since it is so bright and loud I think that’s a pretty good deterrent showing the arc. It would not be good to give a nice long warning zap and then have it fail when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, easy to use stun gun
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my wife who walks trails for exercise. Thought being it could repel stray dogs as well as people if necessary. It is easy to use and easy to carry. The flashlight is nice if out after dark. I have not tested it's effectiveness but believe just showing it could be a person deterrent. It's like insurance. It's something you pay for but if you never use it it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OUUUUUUUUUUUUUCH! OMG!
customer_reviews.text: I can say with first hand it frigging works. I forgot what the seller advertised on this site about the SIDE SHOCK PLATES.......and, stupidly touched it. I am a 5' 9" tall woman weighing around 120 pounds....that quick second was more than enough to make me glad I am not an attacker that may end up getting zapped by this thing. The sound alone would make me surrender. So, make sure your hands are nowhere near the top when you test it out.
customer_reviews.author: The Rebel

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE, RECOMMEND YOU DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: These are legal in Maryland. Amazon will not ship to Maryland. A friend placed the order and shipped 5 of them to me. Upon opening the boxes, every one of the cases were moldy. Two of the stun guns could not be charged due to the fact the charging prongs on the stun gun itself, did not stick out far enough for the charger to make contact to charge the sun gun.
customer_reviews.author: John B

product_meta.title: VIPERTEK VTS-989-1 Billion Heavy Duty Stun Gun - Rechargeable with LED Flashlight
product_meta.description: The VIPERTEK VTS-989 stun gun really packs a punch! Just test firing this unit into the air is often enough to stop an attacker. As the bright electric current pulsates between the test prongs and creates an intimidating electrical sound, an attacker with any sense at all will be stopped in his tracks. If the sight and sound doesn't stop him, a jolt from this stun gun certainly will bring an attacker down! When an attacker is touched by the stun gun it will disrupt the message the brain sends to the voluntary muscles. Simply touching an attacker will deliver a high voltage shock causing loss of balance and muscle control, confusion, and disorientation bringing him to his knees and making him incapable of further aggressive activity. Due to restrictions in some states, county and city laws we do not ship to the following locations: Hawaii, Massachusetts, Michigan, Connecticut, New Jersey, Illinois, New York, Rhode Island, Wisconsin, District of Columbia, Annapolis, MD, Baltimore, MD, Chicago, IL, Philadelphia, PA, Baltimore County, MD, Crawford County,IA. VIPERTEK is a registered US trademark.
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL SELF DEFENSE EQUIPMENT: Powerful heavy duty stun gun flashlight combination. Delivers painful stoppping power and backed by a Lifetime Warranty.

SNATCH PREVENTION TECHNOLOGY: Shock plates on the side of the stun gun will shock an attacker if they attempt to take the gun from you; Contoured grip aids hand alignment making it easy to use and control.
INTERNAL RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: Our stun gun simply plugs into a standard wall outlet for a complete recharge. No Batteries needed! Charging cord included.

ULTRA SHARP SPIKE ELECTRODES: Helps penetrate through thick clothing. COMPACT SIZE: 6.5” long x 2” wide x 1". This stun gun also comes with free wrist strap and holster case for easy everyday carrying.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
